alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Interstate 5 Corridor; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 07 at 3:19AM PST until November 08 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Interstate 5 Corridor, Western Antelope Valley Foothills and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Interstate 5 Corridor; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
